title: Prefetch builder
description: Generate a script used to prefetch resources for an application

resourceTypes.description: An object describing the resource types that should be prefetched.

crossorigin.description: Flag that sets crossorigin attribute on links. If true it will be set for all prefetched resources.

targetBuild.description: The target build where prefetch should be applied. Used for identifying the `outputPath` of the build.

production.description: Flag for creating a production (minified) version of the js file or a development one.

staticsFullPath.description: By default the prefetched resources are hosted next to the `ngxPrefetch.js` file, on the same server. If it is not the case, you can configure the full path of the resources that will be prefetched. It is also possible to set this value by runtime. Instead of setting it in the Builder's options, you can search and replace for `{STATICS_FULL_PATH}` on the server side in order to inject a path.
